name: Other Exchange Company (Terminating) (EVC)
title: OTC

validEntry.description: COMMON LANGUAGE EC Code – A four alpha character
code, which identifies providers in North America,
COMMON LANGUAGE EC Code –A two alpha character
code, which identifies the former Bell companies maintained
Company Code –A four alpha/numeric character code
structure assigned and maintained by NECA for North

validEntryNotes: Valid EC codes are outlined in Telcordia Technologies practice BR 751-100-112.
Valid Company Codes are available from NECA.
usageNotes: Required when the associated EVCMPID field is populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: The format and structure of this field is defined by ANSI in document T1.251, Identification of Telecommunications Service Provider Codes for the North American Telecommunications System.
